title: mysql出现问题
author: Leng_FengDaDa
txt_content:
[12:57:08] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 0/INFO] []: [iConomy] Database Error: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: The driver was unable to create a connection due to an inability to establish the client portion of a socket.

This is usually caused by a limit on the number of sockets imposed by the operating system. This limit is usually configurable. 

For Unix-based platforms, see the manual page for the 'ulimit' command. Kernel or system reconfiguration may also be required.

For Windows-based platforms, see Microsoft Knowledge Base Article 196271 (Q196271).

求具体解决方法
